alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 3:49AM MST until December 09 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 2 inches. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Deer Park, Bonners Ferry, Colville, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Kettle Falls, Eastport, Chewelah, Orin-Rice Road, Priest River, Athol, Springdale-Hunters Road, Northport, Sandpoint, Flowery Trail Road, and Newport. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Noon PST today. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 5 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
